title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.8 - Disability income insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.8 - Disability income insurance

State Regulations

Disability income insurance is an insurance policy which provides for periodic payments, weekly or monthly, for a specified period during the continuance of disability resulting from sickness or injury. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
52.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
